results.title: Double benefit of metformin treatment: improved bladder function in cyclophosphamide-induced cystitis and enhanced cytotoxicity in cancer cells.
results.text_hl: Our results indicate that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ has a strong potential as a therapeutic adjuvant to prevent CP-induced @<m>DISEASE_Cystitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003556 @@@cystitis@@@ while enhancing the efficacy of CP.

citations.NLM: Engin S, Barut EN, Soysal AC, Keskin O, Kerimoglu G, Kadioglu M, Sezen S. Double benefit of metformin treatment: improved bladder function in cyclophosphamide-induced cystitis and enhanced cytotoxicity in cancer cells. Naunyn Schmiedebergs Arch Pharmacol. 2021 Jun;394(6):1167-1175. PMID: 33512558
